website_summaries.verdict: This popular cookware set sits in the mid-range in terms of both price and quality.
pros: Nonstick Teflon and stay-cool handles for easier cooking and cleanup, plus safety from burns of course
Crafted of durable hard anodized aluminium
cons: Not suitable for magnetic induction stove tops
Non-stick coating is unsafe for dishwasher and broiler use

customer_reviews.title: Be Wary the Seller On This One...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to order this set to replace our much loved Simply Calphalon pots that have served us well over the years. What came was a box of someone's mismatched, used cookware without the lids and most of which wasn't Simply. We're not sure if it was a Calphalon error or an Amazon Fulfillment error, but someone isn't checking people's returns before they're sent out to new customers. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J Rowell

customer_reviews.title: GLASS LID SHATTERED!
customer_reviews.text: Lid shattered while cooking! I was cooking spaghetti (on low) with the lid on the sauce and it cracked and shattered the entire glass lid! :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: inconsistent quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set for just under a year, and I use them regularly (I cook a few times/week). I also followed all of the care and usage instructions - no metal utensils, wait for them to cool before cleaning, and using dishwasher detergent + non-abrasive sponge to hand wash them. While most of my pots and pans are still in good shape, a couple of them are no longer non-stick. I didn't notice any peeling or other issues; they simply stopped being nonstick and I have to use lots of oil/butter to prevent my food from sticking, and even then it often doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: I've had a Calphalon Simply 12" Everyday Pan for years and l Iove it. Decided I needed to invest in the same series for a pot and pan set. I couldn't be more pleased. Some of the Calphalon Set Reviews are hit or miss, but I knew that I wouldn't be going wrong if I got the same simply series as what I have been using! Great purchase and the price was unbeatable! It heats evenly, the non-stick is awesome. Even if it does stick without the use of any kind of oil, you can use silicone utensils to scrape it without damaging your pan. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: nik

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Don’t Buy this set
customer_reviews.text: This set is terrible!! The color came off on the first wash! I contacted the manufacturer with my concerns and they didn’t even respond! Terrible service terrible product
customer_reviews.author: Heather Powers

customer_reviews.title: Ok quality but made in China
customer_reviews.text: Quality is ok, but this is made in China not in Toledo OH as the description and the Calphalon website implies
customer_reviews.author: Pascal G.

customer_reviews.title: VERY difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: Nice cookware set. Easy to clean interiors and lids. However....I tried using the company recommended cleanser, Bar Keepers Friend Cookware Cleanser, to remove some food stains that became baked onto the exterior of one of the pans. Even though I followed the cleanser's directions explicitly I was unable to remove any of the food stains from either the anodized aluminum or stainless steel surfaces. I keep my pans on display on a pot rack but this one makes the whole display appear dirty. If you value the appearance of your cookware, I would not recommend this collection.
customer_reviews.author: Kyenta1

customer_reviews.title: I'm a good home cook
customer_reviews.text: I've had more expensive cookware, I've had cheap cookware. I'm a good home cook. I throw dinner parties for 25. I need dependable cookware this is great cookware and its dependable. Yes, buy it. You won't be sorry
customer_reviews.author: Susan WC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this more expensive set because I was tired of using less expensive pots and pans that were useless. This set, has now been added to that list. I have followed all the recommendations on how to use them, using non metal utensils, cleaning care, etc. Everything sticks and they have scratched easily. I'm so disappointed that I made the monetary investment and they have failed.
customer_reviews.author: BillieJo Hartjes

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.  Great Set.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this set so my when I purchased it in 2009 that I bought it again this year when my set started showing some age. Still useful, I gave the old set to a friend of mine and bought the same set again plus a 12" pan with cover and a 7" deep sauce pot to recreate the full set (which are now not included the in set but were when I bought it in 2009). I look forward to another decade plus of use.
customer_reviews.author: Tabba

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this set at all. After a few months of use the spaghetti pot is warped and the lid will not go on. The other pots are too small. They claim they are non-stick but everything sticks. A nightmare to clean because I can't use SOS. Calphalon used top be a high quality product- the cookware I received does not reflect this. Disappointed. EDIT: I want to add that most of the reviews giving it 5 stars and high praise were from 2 years ago or more. Quality has deteriorated over time
customer_reviews.author: Just Judy

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend, quality is not as high grade as its said to be
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we've only had this set for 4 months and now the outside of the pans have faded to a white dusty color. It leaves a black residue on my hand when touching.
customer_reviews.author: Amisha

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This set was way TOO small in size for the $200 I spent on it. But the return window was closed. I WANT TO RETURN IT
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best cookware in this price range and higher.
customer_reviews.text: We really love this cookware. The only thing I can say negative about it is it is not dishwasher safe which is disappointing. It distributes heat evenly with no sticky mess afterwards. It is a heavy gauge steel with heavy-gauge handles and quality glass lids period it cleans up like new. For the money I think this is one of the best products out there. No comparison to a $80 set of T-fal. The quality of this Calphalon product is far and above anything that you would find in this price range. I would definitely recommend and will be buying more in the future
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set thirty years ago and they were ready to be replaced. If I hadn't already thrown out the old ones I would have sent these back. The walls are thin they are light weight. I doubt that they will last a year no way they will last another 30. You shouldn't be allowed to call them calphalon if the company changes the quality so drastically
customer_reviews.author: Amy Gawelko

customer_reviews.title: One of the Pots Came Out Slightly Bent
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of other Calphalon pots and so I decided to buy a complete set. Right out of the box, one of the smaller pots was slightly bent. And I've still yet to hear from their product support -- and that was over two months ago. In short, I like the Calphalon products, but I don't appreciate a bent product out of the box nor do I appreciate their support ignoring me.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Raburn

customer_reviews.title: Pot pan set
customer_reviews.text: Calphalon is an iconic brand . I first saw the set at my friends place and know how they felt so I was super excited when I saw on amazon ! Once I received the main difference was that these didn’t have the Toledo Oh USA stamp under the pots and pan and in the box it wasn’t made in USA . Maybe I received a non us made batch so I sadly returned next Day back to amazon . :(
customer_reviews.author: New york

customer_reviews.title: Information From Richard O'R
customer_reviews.text: Some information about this product for consideration factors pertaining to.This product simply calphalon is not in production any more.Going to costco there is currently a set that costs considerably less.One must be aware of the differences.I did lengthy review on those found.When looking at all reviews one had said something about hands getting burned in touching handles and lids.That is what makes SIMPLY calpholon unique.Classic set cheaper.This product has silicon on handles and when properly handled does not burn your hand.Best set of pans Iv'e owned yet Hand wash only!10yr wnty. Thank You for reading
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First adult pan and pans set
customer_reviews.text: Was using Revereware for the last 20 years and I am so happy I made the switch! Love how cooking is so easy with these Calphalon pots and pans! Making an over easy egg has never been easier, the egg just slides right off the fry pan without sticking to the pan. Heat distribution is excellent as I have an old-school coil electric stove top and heat distribution with other pots and pans has always been an issue. Love this set and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for both my daughter and daughter-in-law for Christmas. They love them, but when I first saw them in person, I was shocked at how small they are. The largest spot is so small! I thought it would be more like a bigger stock pot. This looks like a play pot that a child would use....that's just my opinion. Good quality, but be sure to check the sizes before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Was somewhat disappointed that I could not send the pan back for ...
customer_reviews.text: The items in this set look to be well made but there was one pan that had some small interior surface rubs on the non-stick coating. Called Calphalon only after they did not respond to my email through their customer service. I found out they consider surface rubs normal so it does not meet their Warranty policy and as a result it is not an exchange item. If in fact you had a valid return Calaphalon does not provide a return shipping label so it is at the buyers expense. Was somewhat disappointed that I could not send the pan back for an exchange under their Warranty so it will have to used as is.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky D

customer_reviews.title: Chef, I am not
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to be premature in reviewing this purchase. But I have had the chance to use almost all the cookware, and I am very pleased with heat distribution and the taste of the food when cooked. Will they hold up, or retain the non-stick condition? That's a later review.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: 17 and going strong.
customer_reviews.text: I have had my basic Calphalon for 17 years. So it was finally time to get some new pieces. My previous set I actually only got rid of two pieces and still kept the rest bc they are still in fantastic shape. I bought these during covid and have cooked on them almost every day since March. The summer crop of beans and corn cane in and I cooked down 24 dozen ears of corn in my big Calphalon pot. No burning or sticking at the bottom. I truly won’t get a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Pixies

customer_reviews.title: These DO NOT come clean
customer_reviews.text: Writing this review after a year and a half of use. Heat distribution is fine. But as with all the other reviews, these are awful to clean. In fact, they just don’t come clean period. The underside of the pan is so gross and sticky. No matter what I use to get the spilled oils off, nothing works. They are so overpriced for the quality that it’s not even remotely worth it. Skip this set!!
customer_reviews.author: H. Shults

customer_reviews.title: Good pots and pans at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these pots and pans about 6 weeks. We selected them based on Consumer Reports review. They are wonderful. Non-stick surfaces do what they are supposed to do i.e.food does not stick. Clean-up of the insides is easy. We've been carefully following the mfr. instructions to do that. Metal handles on glass lids get warm but not hot. They heat quickly and on our old electric stove, we use less heat than required, with no problems. Exterior is also easy to clean. Some light brown spots on the exterior bottoms from use. They can be diminished but do not disappear. That's the only problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rick in Maine

customer_reviews.title: I guess item are made cheaply today.
customer_reviews.text: I have the same collection that I bought in 2005. The difference is amazing. Items I still use from 2005 are heavier, bigger, still effective today. This new collections works and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W. Uhl

customer_reviews.title: Not normal quality
customer_reviews.text: 14 months later the finish is coming off inside of pots. Never washed them with anything abrasive.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Costanzo

customer_reviews.title: Great cookware at an unbelievable price
customer_reviews.text: My old set of cookware was in need of replacement as the teflon finish in the skillet was starting to look rough. After some research on the internet, I decided on this set. When the set arrived I was amazed at how light the pans, skillets, and pot were. I was even more amazed at how quickly they heated and how even the heat was distributed over the bottom surface. Cooking with these pants is a pleasure and has improved my cooking and the food I prepare.
customer_reviews.author: Kplus8

customer_reviews.title: Worth every pennny!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a stainless steel set before this and they were junk the same day. These, on the other hand, stay as clean as soap washing soap. I’m half tempted to drop some epoxy in the pan just to see if it rinses out once it’s cooked. The sizes are great. The pot is tall more than wide which is smart, leaves more room for the other burners.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny at $113 on sale
customer_reviews.text: This the perfect set for me with everything i wanted. I ended up getting a 3 Qt Stainless Steel and Non-Stick from separate makers but who can beat the price of this set. Handles DO NOT get hot whatsoever. The weight of them is nice as well as they are not as heavy as my individual Analon pieces which i have a few as well. Great Value and great product! You cannot lose with this one especially when it was on sale at $113!
customer_reviews.author: jwhitSJ

customer_reviews.title: Skillets so small
customer_reviews.text: Skillets were very small. I gave them to my daughter to use in her kitchen. I will have to re purchase a big girl set from another company. Disappointed with this purchase and package is to heavy to bother with returning.
customer_reviews.author: Sogo Oglesby

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are such good quality!!! Food doesn’t stick, best cooking ware I’ve ever had !
customer_reviews.author: Jaquelin E.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always used a slap him pans so when my daughter said she needed new one I bought her this set. Good quality for the price. Easy to clean and cook with.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the buy. I got them on sale because but they're totally worth full price. Super easy to clean, nice and heavy. They may not be super high end but honestly, they're the nicest pots and pans I have ever owned and I don't have any gripes with them. I feel like they cook really evenly and are all a really good size.
customer_reviews.author: Celestial

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick does not last; color of pans quickly becomes silver (instead of black)
customer_reviews.text: Pots/pans look nice and are made of thick, heavy metal. Unfortunately, they are not dishwasher safe, and the non-stick coating will literally wash off with a single washing. Additionally, the exterior gray/black color that makes them look nice also washes off easily and leaves them a weird silver color. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Extremely small
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed when I recieved these! They are VERY tiny, if you're cooking for 1 person it's the perfect size. Definitely not suitable for a cooking for a family of 4
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cooking set
customer_reviews.text: I hate to cook but I love these pans. It’s the first decent set I’ve had in years. Heat distribution is even. Love the extra handle on the large pan. No sticking. Easy to clean. I do not put these in the dishwasher. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: It’s a gamble
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if they mistakenly sent me a used set but two pots were so damaged that the lids don’t properly fit on them. I’m working with calphalon directly to resolve this but overall wouldn’t recommend as even the other products appear as if they are of lower quality or have been used by someone else— scratch easily, bent, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Philippi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cookware! the non-stick is really NON-STICK!
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of cleaning!Cooks very well. My daughter was using them one evening and thought she was in wonderland! The rice starch wipes right out of the cold pot! Eggs slide out! Excellent for every level of cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Viking Queen 54

customer_reviews.title: Heat damage
customer_reviews.text: One of my pans already has some heat damage after one use. And the set is smaller than I thought it would be (even though the sizes are written in the description). Other than that I've used Caphelon products for years and this set does the job so I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Lich

customer_reviews.title: Re-evaluate Calphalon Pots/Pans Packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Calphalon really needs to reevaluate their packaging and security with each pot/pan in the box. 2 out of 10 of the pots have deep scratches, which could possibly contaminate the food upon cooking. I really love the Calphalon brand, but the company needs to fix its packaging. I'm going to return this and just physically go to a store to inspect each pot/pan before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: No hassle, Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We loved the first pan we got, we found ourselves trying to cook in one pan so we didn't have to use any of the others. So we had to get the full set. It's only been a month but there is no going back. They cook evenly and my husband doesn't even mind hand washing because nothing sticks to them. We have been able to significantly cut down on our oil/butter/fat usage when cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kinue

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Starting to see scratches after only a few uses of the pans.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg Ayzikovich

customer_reviews.title: UNDERSTAND THAT THESE ARE NOT DISH WASHER FRIENDLY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The first time they shipped it , they had the wrong lid size and it was a hassle putting it back and re-sending, too much work. However it is very very good pricing that you will not find in the stores. They are not dishwasher safe. I did follow the instructions on first time conditioning ( every thing needs a manual now a days ) and honestly, I have never seen my oat meal so easy to clean after cooking. Vegetables never stick. I really miss good quality non stick pans. I use only wooden utensils on them, I'll see how they stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Michaels

customer_reviews.title: This set is excellent for non-stick
customer_reviews.text: This set is excellent for non-stick, heats well and cooks evenly. There were a couple of scratches on delivery which is disappointing as I have them on a bakers rack. I have also noticed a couple of scorch marks after only a few uses. All and all I would buy it again. The price is great for the quality. I also like that Wal-Mart is now carrying this line so I can add any pieces I need and have the same style.
customer_reviews.author: BKT

customer_reviews.title: Good quality everyday pots
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set, it doesn’t feel as heavy as other calphalon sets but it’s nice nonetheless. I’ve used the frying pan in the oven and my steak came out perfect. This is a good set for a young/new family or people who don’t need to cook a large amount of food everyday. These pots are ideal for cooking for 2-3 people.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I owned one Calphalon 10” pan before I bought this set. My only complaint was that the old pan had sharp points on the end of the handle. I was pleased when I unpacked these to find that the handle was redesigned and are now nice and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a while and wanted to use them a few times before reviewing. Verdict - wonderful! So very easy to clean, cooks evenly and stylish to boot. When I used stainless I had to scrub and soak, scrub and soak. With these beauties I can clean up super fast after a meal and relax.
customer_reviews.author: Censored Here

customer_reviews.title: but that's just fine with me
customer_reviews.text: A little lighter than the more expensive version, but that's just fine with me! We primarily have used cast iron in the past, but our current rental has a flat top electric stove so cast iron wasn't appropriate any more. I forgot that non-stick can be so nice!
customer_reviews.author: Mel L

customer_reviews.title: Great set of pans for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love cooking with these pans. Everything seems to heat evenly and they are very easy to clean. Only thing I dislike are the thin handles that heat up if cooking something long term.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I was not very impressed by these. It's kind of my fault, I should have read the description of them better. Way overpriced for what you actually get!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Henning

customer_reviews.title: Excited to cook!
customer_reviews.text: The pans arrived well packaged, not damaged and in good condition. They are sturdy. I shall cook with them for a while and see how they work out. Very pleased with this product delivery and quality thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Kenney

customer_reviews.title: good; not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: was hoping the quality will be better. not the greatest; started changing color and pealing off within a couple of years. kind of disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: iajarmeh

customer_reviews.title: The best pots and pans you will ever own
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pots and pans that I have ever used. They are durable and easy to clean. I’ve had no issues with the set that I’ve owned for years now, and I just bought a second set as a gift. Mine still look brand new. It’s important to note that they must be hand washed and cared for, but if you are willing to do that, they will remain clean and new for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and work great
customer_reviews.text: Have to be extra cautious to keep them from warping like other people have had experience with but over all we really like these pots and pans
customer_reviews.author: S. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: I Should've Bought These Years Ago
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic set. I've roasted, baked, fried, seared, and sauteed and these pots & pans seem to get better with use. I know they're only heat-safe to 400° but I've definitely broiled in the large pan and all was well. They clean up very easily and are heavy and solid. Excellent value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Inca

customer_reviews.title: Like to cook with these
customer_reviews.text: These are much better than the set that they are replacing. Easy to clean. Even heat distribution. No complaints. Bought an extra small fry pan.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Maaske

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: Even after much abuse and many moves my set has lasted phenomenally. I have thrown in dishwasher(oops), which is not recommended, but just the external finish is affected. I use on a ceramic top stove currently but have used on the old style electric coils, never any issues! Love the look, that the handles are rubber wrapped, and that they can take a beating. Have had for 4 years and they are still in working condition! No non-stick material loss! Totally worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bendyna

customer_reviews.title: Great pans but didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Very dissapointed with the non-stick coating. It began peeling within the first year, despite me only using plastic utensils and not dishwashing them. Other than that, they worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely content with this order. I did read a few unsatisfied reviews but I disagree with most. I previously brought a large pot and pan by this brand a couple of years ago which worked wonderfully for me and my parents continue to use them today. I bought this set for my first apartment and I could not have made a better choice. The sizes work well for a single or couple, but a larger family would need larger sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Arias

customer_reviews.title: Love the set!
customer_reviews.text: Love the brand Calphalon. Very satisfied with the set. Clean-up a breeze. Had a set of T-Fal, no comparison to Calphalon!
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Calphalon, enough said
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Simply Calphalon pots and pans set. Pans and pots are great and work as advertised. Only issue is that it would be nicer to have a few larger pans in a set.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Luedtke

customer_reviews.title: Love this cookware
customer_reviews.text: I love these pots and pans. They heat evenly and cleanup is easy. They are safe for the grandkids to cook with and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L. Fike

customer_reviews.title: Great cookware set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my Mom on Black Friday. She loves it. Great non-stick cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Great set of cookware
customer_reviews.text: Totall worth it! These pans are great! Super easy to clean and nothing sticks to them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pans
customer_reviews.text: The outside coating has come off. The nonstick surface is still good. Had calaphon before that never did that.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Johnson

customer_reviews.title: These pots and pans will flake after use!
customer_reviews.text: This product flakes off after washing. The outside finish comes off even with hand washing. I would not recommended this brand. After purchasing and seeing them diminish in quality over a few months, I looked at the reviews and saw everyone else experienced the same issue. If I want to replace, I have to pay for shipping for another set that will just do the same! What a scam!
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Good pans
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my mother in law and she was happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise a great set for the
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with the coating on these babies...it doesn't hold up to any and I mean any metal utensils. Otherwise a great set for the money
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Lake Woodwork

customer_reviews.title: Small Sized Cook Set
customer_reviews.text: The set is much smaller than I anticipated, I assumed this was much larger set given the price point and the fact that I purchased on Cyber Monday. Do yourself a favor and just cough up the extra $30-50 more and get you a real sized set. The quality on these looks decent, but the size is very small.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Saavedra

customer_reviews.title: Nice pans
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed with the pans when we unboxed them. They look and feel durable and long lasting. We are using them for the first time today. And, I don’t think I will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: James perry

customer_reviews.title: High quality pans.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Bought for our daughter and son- in- law for Christmas. They really enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: James Parker

customer_reviews.title: Ugly after use
customer_reviews.text: Ugly stains appeared on the outside of the pans after the first use, you need to buy special cleaners. Hadn't owned my pans more than a week when I dropped the lid to the 2 qt pan from 12" high and it broke into a million pieces. Glass lids to my cheap Paula Deans never break. Calphalon of course won't warranty replace. They cook well, but a lot work to keep the outside nice. Not a pan you can show off in your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: emor

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long to get this set. It's wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the set. Very easy to clean and the heat distribution is perfect. I can officially say that I am a Calphalon Lover now. And the price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Hill

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Really am enjoying the product and it has performed great.
customer_reviews.author: Dewdog68

customer_reviews.title: I love this set and the great value it delivers
customer_reviews.text: I love this set and the great value it delivers. These great-looking pans distribute heat evenly. Glass covers allow easy monitoring of all the action and quick identification of leftovers in the fridge. A non-stick finish makes clean-up a breeze. I would recommend Calphalon to anyone looking for good quality cooking gear at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Correia

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive . Doesn’t last as long as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Just like my old set. I don’t like that it’s not dishwasher safe. And it scratches very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to replace our old pot and pan sets. These are far superior and we couldn't be happier. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gerrish

customer_reviews.title: It's Calphalon or None!
customer_reviews.text: We received a 10 pc Cookware Set for a wedding gift 10 years ago! Still use 2 pots from that set and the wife said it's time for new and she only wants Calphalon! It heats evenly, cleans easily, money very well spent if you take your "tools of the trade" for cooking seriously! You won't be disappointed with your purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Guth

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. I have had these pans for less than two years and the handles and screws are rusted. We never put them in the dishwasher and always immediately dry them.
customer_reviews.author: kbdro

customer_reviews.title: ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a better surface, its already scratching, not as durable as the reviews I read. I really wanted these pots and pans to be the great quality I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Evers

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Non-stick is an understatement. Nearly immediate reaction when adjusting burner temperature. Boiling water to simmering in like 10 seconds
customer_reviews.author: Amp

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I used the large pot to make chicken soup which, once it reached a boil, simmered for three hours. This was the first time I used this pot and I was shocked that the bottom of the pot has white streaks that appear to be from the turner coils. I bought this set after my pots and pans wore out. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: C. McKegney

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookware
customer_reviews.text: Great cookware. Easy to use and clean. We have washed mostly by hand as instructed but have also tried the top rack of the dish washer. Items work well in oven. We have used less cooking grease/ butter and clean up had been simple.it is a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves these
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of use, they are still like new with no visible wear nor scratches. Good cookware.
customer_reviews.author: W. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, does not seem to scratch easily, love that they can go in the oven, nonstick works well also. When I first opened and washed them the texture and smell reminded me of river rocks... Smooth throughout without a noticeable nonstick coating like some cheaper brands
customer_reviews.author: Mega N

customer_reviews.title: Expensive with bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Update : I just return the product. Bad quality and it is not original
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Easily scratches. Hard to clean. Don't understand all the high ratings. Too late to return them.
customer_reviews.author: S. McPherson

customer_reviews.title: very nice design, glad it has rubber edges on the ...
customer_reviews.text: packaging says 'hand wash only' but came out brand new from my dishwasher!, very nice design, glad it has rubber edges on the handles, just make sure you do not touch the steel part, it's pretty darn hot.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G. Kalesians

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, great quality and price point
customer_reviews.text: Did a ton of research in my price range. These didn’t disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Meacham

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment!
customer_reviews.text: Great pans. Been using them daily for months now and couldn't be happier. They retain heat well, evenly, and are durable. Only 2 issues is that the lids don't have vents and the handles are kinda short for my big hands so I have burned myself a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: JHill

customer_reviews.title: Small Pans
customer_reviews.text: Small Pans. I was disappointed the pans were so small. The description didn't list the sizes, I should have taken that as a warning. The large skillets are only 10 inches, the small one is 8 inches. The pot is 5 quarts. The sauce pans are 1 quart and 2 quart.
customer_reviews.author: corlane

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great pots and pan set. Awesome starter set or new married couple
customer_reviews.author: Khloes Mom

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed that there was not a lid to fit the ...
customer_reviews.text: The set was OK. I was disappointed that there was not a lid to fit the 8" skillet. I had to purchase it separately.
customer_reviews.author: J Hill

customer_reviews.title: best pans I've owned
customer_reviews.text: but not cheap. When you get what you pay for, you better get a lot, right? Pans stay slick, clean easy, heat fast and evenly and look good. I even burned food in one, and it still cleaned up like new. good pans.
customer_reviews.author: M Lo

customer_reviews.title: Great cookware, sides stain easily, however.
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying my new cookware. Works wonderfully on my flat glasstop stove. Sides stain easily, however. First time cooking with frying pan, some of the cooking oil ran over the side, and I still haven't figured out how to remove the stain/stickiness. I'm going to try vinegar next.
customer_reviews.author: Stagedoor

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Super easy to clean and they dry really quickly.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Paid $169 at Kohls for the good ones. These are supposed to be the same ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the same quality as the same item on sale in retail stores. Paid $169 at Kohls for the good ones. These are supposed to be the same but are lighter weight and lesser quality although the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: w r deuel

customer_reviews.title: Spend the time to wash them by hand and store them correctly and they seem like they will last
customer_reviews.text: Just your average set of cookware. Be carful when you store them and make sure you do jot stack them on top of each other. Also the non stick will scratch if you use abrasive cleaner. Spend the time to wash them by hand and store them correctly and they seem like they will last
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up even though you have to wash by hand.
customer_reviews.text: Easy clean up even though you have to wash by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Giberson

product_meta.title: Calphalon Simply Pots and Pans Set, 10 piece Cookware Set, Nonstick
product_meta.description: Size:10-PieceThis nonstick cookware is perfect for dozens of everyday tasks from steaming rice to reheating soups and sauces. Hard anodized aluminum construction provides even heating across the bottom and up the sides of the pan. The durable, double coated nonstick interior of the pots and pans set is ideal for making caramel, fondue and other sticky sauces. Sauces pour easily from the pan and clean up is soap and water simple. Hand wash only. NEVER place cookware in an automatic dishwasher, or use abrasive cleaning pads or cleansers that can damage the pan and void the warranty. Interior clean the interior nonstick surface of the pan with a liquid dish washing detergent such as Dawn and a non abrasive sponge or soft bristle brush. Exterior clean the hard anodized exterior surface of the pan with a liquid dish washing detergent such as dawn and a non abrasive sponge or soft bristle brush. For stubborn spots ON THE EXTERIOR ONLY, use Bar Keeper’s Friend cleanser and a non abrasive sponge. Before You Cook: Before using cookware for the first time, wash in warm, sudsy water and dry thoroughly. Stovetop Use: Safe for use on gas, electric, electric coil, halogen, and ceramic cook tops. Not safe for broiler use.
feature_bullets: Hard-anodized aluminum cookware is durable and resists corrosion and warping
Durable, 2-layer nonstick interior prevents food from sticking and makes cleanup effortless
Long silicone handles stay cool on the stovetop
Oven-safe up to 400 degrees F, so you can easily go from stovetop to oven
Included with set: 8"" fry pan, 10"" fry pan, 1-qt. sauce pan with cover, 2-qt. sauce pan with cover, 3-qt. saute pan with cover, 6-qt. stock pot with cover

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
